## Usage

```{r lib-ex}
library(gt)
library(pubcheck)
library(tidyverse)

# current version
packageVersion("pubcheck")

```

```{r ex-01}
check_ssh_pub_key("~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub") |> 
  mutate(key = ifelse(is.na(key), NA_character_, sprintf("%s…", substr(key, 1, 30)))) |> 
  gt::gt()
```

```{r ex-02}
check_gh_user_keys("hrbrmstr") |> 
  mutate(key = ifelse(is.na(key), NA_character_, sprintf("%s…", substr(key, 1, 30)))) |> 
  gt::gt()
```

```{r ex-03}
check_gh_following("koenrh") |> 
  mutate(key = ifelse(is.na(key), NA_character_, sprintf("%s…", substr(key, 1, 30)))) |> 
  gt::gt()
```
